hero.subtitle: Insights in Behavioural Economics & Human Decision-Making ↓

philosophy.title: Where human behaviour meets economic decision-making
philosophy.description: A behavioural economist exploring the hidden drivers behind choices, preferences, and actions. By studying how individuals respond to information, risk, and incentives, I uncover patterns that traditional economics often overlooks. My work blends psychology, data interpretation, and strategic insight to better explain real-world behaviour and guide smarter economic outcomes.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I’ve always been fascinated by how people think, decide, and act and how the right policies can genuinely improve lives. Today, I combine behavioral science, data analysis, and economic intelligence to help organizations understand problems better and design solutions that work.

experience.description: Designed and conducted a comprehensive study on employee well-being and engagement. Analyzed survey data from 200+ employees to identify key drivers of satisfaction.
Orchestrated rigorous background checks and compliance investigations for educational candidates. Streamlined data management processes to meet international safeguarding standards.

education.description: Behavioral and Digital Economics in Effective Management.
Triple major in Psychology, Economics, Sociology.

projects.title: UNIQLO Data ANalysis with Dashboard
projects.context: UNIQLO needed to analyse sales performance across France to decide where and when to open new stores.
projects.action: Built an interactive Power BI dashboard to assess regional sales, profit, and seasonal patterns.
projects.result: Identified Île-de-France and Grand Est as strongest regions and recommended Q1/Q3 as optimal opening periods.

projects.title: Eurimobility Case Study for Procurement
projects.context: Eurimobility was heavily exposed to supply-chain risk, relying on Asia for 63% of its key components.
projects.action: Analyzed risks and market sentiment, supporting a multi-criteria auction to shift sourcing.
projects.result: Dropped Asian dependency to 22% and generated €1.1M in TCO savings.

projects.title: Serenve - an AI based Face Scanner
projects.context: Seeking to reduce cognitive load in skincare selection.
projects.action: Built an AI facial-scan system enhanced by sensory marketing and behavioral nudges (endowment effect, processing fluency).
projects.result: Created a high-trust ritual experience, significantly improving user engagement over standard shopping methods.
